thread.title: Diageo boss Ivan Menezes’ pay plunges after tough year
thread.title_full: Diageo boss Ivan Menezes’ pay plunges after tough year

title: Diageo boss Ivan Menezes’ pay plunges after tough year
text:
12 Aug 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
The total pay package of Diageo CEO Ivan Menezes fell by 46.5% to £3.9m during the spirit giant’s 2014/15 financial year after a period of stagnant volume growth. Available to members only
